JOB DESCRIPTION: We believe you can only learn by doing things. So we are interested to hire those who wants to work on live projects with their academic education. We'll help you to understand tech and get a hands-on experience & we expect that you can collaborate in our running project. Your responsibility is to understand the given task, learn suggested technology and code for submodules.     Qualifications    Persuing any technical degree.    Should have enthusiast enough to accept and learn new technology.    Good with logic and can convert logic into code.
